name: Burst Vein
description:
Overview

You're Flek, a goblin pencil-pusher sent down a mine to investigate why the workers haven't been heard from in weeks. Suspecting a unionisation effort, you delve deeper and deeper into the mine, but things are more than they seem...

The Tamanegi Collective has grown, and keen to take on our most ambitious project yet. Enjoy puzzles, mystery, unionised goblins, and a cosmic entity i̵̲̣̠̒̓͘͘n̸͉͚̜̊d̷̯̓e̸̳̺̤̐s̷̡̡̘̭̓̇͠͝c̵̫̄̅r̸̨̫̈̃̆́į̷̬͌̄b̸̩̈͝a̶̭̿͂͑͐b̷̙̯͈̈́͂̆l̵̥̉̽̐ͅë̵̝̤̻̦̍͒ ̸̹͓̓̆́̀b̴͉̖̳̣̊y̴̮̦̾̑͊̓ ̶̭̅ṃ̴̏̀͝ḯ̵̙̜̘̱̿n̷̨̛͎͓̲ḍ̸̛̜̱̱͋͐s̴̞̻͐͠ ̵̢̈́̎̀͝l̶̙̩̹̟̈́ĩ̴̝̻̈k̷̺̳͎͌͠ͅȩ̴̹͙͌̏̌̕ ̸̤̱̤͐͗ō̷͕̦̫̕͠u̶̙͉̍̓r̸̼̬͉̆̔̉͐͜s̸͖̳̪̼̓̂͐

Controls

  • Movement - WASD
  • Interact with object - E
  • Jump - Space
  • Escape - Exit game
